name: The Exorcism of Ghosty Joe
description:
A hideous spectre has haunted the mansion of the old Baron! Finish the sacred incantation before the power of GHOSTY JOE grows too strong for a frail old mortal. Oh, and do keeps your wits about you. You never know when he's watching...

A tiny, spoopy game for #1buttonjam.  Many many thanks to GhastKarp for testing this game, giving plenty of feedback, and co-creating the incomparable Ghosty Joe character.
